comment:
>>38007496

The five of you sprint across the street to catch the Nameless off-guard, breaking into the alley right as they reach the steel double-doors.

A pair of explosions from inside rattles the building on its foundation, and they stagger. Then, one of them catches the group out of the corner of their eye. It's a pair of men armed with longswords; one looks only a few degrees removed from the default avatar, while the other has deeply-tanned skin, and jet-black hair tied back in a waist-length ponytail.

They begin to draw their weapons, but you and Tatsumaki are already upon them...

> [[ 1d100 ]]
name: BSO
